#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>

using namespace std;

int arr1[]={9,180,2700,36000,450000,5400000,63000000,720000000};
int arr2[]={9,90,900,9000,90000,900000,9000000,90000000};

long power(int x,int y)
{
   long temp;
    
    if( y == 0)
       return 1;
    
    temp = power(x, y/2);
    
    if (y%2 == 0)
        return(temp*temp);
    else
        return x*temp*temp;
}

int main() 
{
    int n,sum,i,j,k,val,newval,len;
    char str[20];
    while(1)
    {
            scanf("%s",str);
            if(str[0]=='#')
               break;
            sum=0;
            n=0;
            
            len=strlen(str);
            
            for(i=len-1;i>=0;i--)
            {
               n+=(  (str[i]-48) * (power(10,len-i-1))  );
            }
            for(i=0;i<8;i++)
            {
                  sum+=arr1[i];
                  if(n < sum)
                    break;
            }
            k=i+1;
            if(i==8)
              val=n-sum;
            else
              val=n-(sum-arr1[i]);
            
            if(val%k!=0)
              printf("Impossible!\n");
            else
            {
                   newval=val/k;
                   sum=0;
                   for(j=0;j<k-1;j++)
                      sum+=arr2[j];
                   
                   printf("%d\n",newval+sum);
            }
    }
    return 0;
}
